name: Event-Driven & Streaming Architecture
patterns: Use Redis Pub/Sub for low-latency message distribution.
Implement WebSocket horizontal scaling with a central state backend.
Consider Apache Kafka for persistent event streaming if scale exceeds 100k events/sec.

name: Enterprise Security & Governance
patterns: Implement OIDC/SAML integration for SSO capabilities.
Ensure all PII is encrypted at rest using AES-256.
Maintain immutable audit logs for every state-changing API request.

name: High-Throughput Data Patterns
patterns: Use Read-Replicas for database scaling in read-heavy workloads.
Implement Elasticsearch for complex text-search requirements.
Partition large tables in PostgreSQL to maintain query performance.
